content.name: neutral
content.prop: neutral op = (THE x. ∀y. op x y = y ∧ op y x = y)

content.name: monoidal
prop: (∀x. ∀y. op x y = op y x) ∧
(∀x. ∀y. ∀z. op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z) ∧ (∀x. op (neutral op) x = x)

content.name: monoidal_ac

proof.th: monoidal op ⊢ monoidal op

monoidal op ⊢ ∀a. op a (neutral op) = a
⊢ _VAR a
monoidal op ⊢ ∀y. op a y = op y a
monoidal op ⊢ op a (neutral op) = op (neutral op) a
monoidal op ⊢ op (neutral op) a = a
monoidal op ⊢ op a (neutral op) = a
monoidal op ⊢ ∀a. op a (neutral op) = a
monoidal op ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)
⊢ _VAR a
⊢ _VAR b
⊢ _VAR c

proof.args: conjD1, {A: ∀x. ∀y. ∀z. op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z, B: ∀x. op (neutral op) x = x}
proof.th: monoidal op ⊢ ∀x. ∀y. ∀z. op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z
monoidal op ⊢ op a (op b c) = op (op a b) c

proof.args: eq_sym_eq, op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)
proof.th: monoidal op ⊢ op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)

monoidal op ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c)
⊢ _VAR a
⊢ _VAR b
⊢ _VAR c
monoidal op ⊢ ∀y. op b y = op y b
monoidal op ⊢ op b (op a c) = op (op a c) b
monoidal op ⊢ ∀y. op b y = op y b
monoidal op ⊢ op b c = op c b

proof.args: conjD1, {A: ∀x. ∀y. ∀z. op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z, B: ∀x. op (neutral op) x = x}
proof.th: monoidal op ⊢ ∀x. ∀y. ∀z. op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z
monoidal op ⊢ op a (op c b) = op (op a c) b

proof.args: op a (op b c) = op (op a c) b
proof.th: monoidal op ⊢ op a (op b c) = op (op a c) b

proof.args: op a (op b c) = op b (op a c)
proof.th: monoidal op ⊢ op a (op b c) = op b (op a c)
monoidal op ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c)
monoidal op ⊢ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c))
monoidal op ⊢ (∀a. ∀b. op a b = op b a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c))
monoidal op ⊢ (∀a. op a (neutral op) = a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. op a b = op b a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c))
monoidal op ⊢ (∀a. op (neutral op) a = a) ∧ (∀a. op a (neutral op) = a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. op a b = op b a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c))
⊢ monoidal op ⟶ (∀a. op (neutral op) a = a) ∧ (∀a. op a (neutral op) = a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. op a b = op b a) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op (op a b) c = op a (op b c)) ∧ (∀a. ∀b. ∀c. op a (op b c) = op b (op a c))

content.name: support_insert
prop: (if f x = neutral op then support op f s else insert x (support op f s))

proof.th: ⊢ (THE x::real. ∀y. x + y = y ∧ y + x = y) = 0
⊢ neutral plus = (0::real)
⊢ neutral plus = (0::real)

proof.args: (∀x::real. ∀y. x + y = y + x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x + (y + z) = x + y + z) ∧ (∀x::real. 0 + x = x)
proof.th: ⊢ (∀x::real. ∀y. x + y = y + x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x + (y + z) = x + y + z) ∧ (∀x::real. 0 + x = x)

proof.args: neutral_real_add, (∀x::real. ∀y. x + y = y + x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x + (y + z) = x + y + z) ∧ (∀x::real. neutral plus + x = x)
proof.th: ⊢ (∀x::real. ∀y. x + y = y + x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x + (y + z) = x + y + z) ∧ (∀x::real. neutral plus + x = x)
⊢ monoidal (plus::real ⇒ real ⇒ real)
⊢ monoidal (plus::real ⇒ real ⇒ real)

proof.args: (∀x::real. ∀y. x * y = y * x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x * (y * z) = x * y * z) ∧ (∀x::real. 1 * x = x)
proof.th: ⊢ (∀x::real. ∀y. x * y = y * x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x * (y * z) = x * y * z) ∧ (∀x::real. 1 * x = x)

proof.args: neutral_real_mul, (∀x::real. ∀y. x * y = y * x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x * (y * z) = x * y * z) ∧ (∀x::real. neutral times * x = x)
proof.th: ⊢ (∀x::real. ∀y. x * y = y * x) ∧ (∀x::real. ∀y. ∀z. x * (y * z) = x * y * z) ∧ (∀x::real. neutral times * x = x)
⊢ monoidal (times::real ⇒ real ⇒ real)

content.name: sum_degenerate

proof.th: ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⊢ ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)}))

proof.args: if_not_P, (if finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)}) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)}) 0 else 0) = 0
proof.th: ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⊢ (if finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)}) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)}) 0 else 0) = 0

proof.args: neutral_real_add, (if finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = neutral plus)}) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = neutral plus)}) (neutral plus) else neutral plus) = 0
proof.th: ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⊢ (if finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = neutral plus)}) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = neutral plus)}) (neutral plus) else neutral plus) = 0

proof.th: ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⊢ (if finite (support plus f s) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) (support plus f s) (neutral plus) else neutral plus) = 0

¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⊢ sum s f = 0
⊢ ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⟶ sum s f = 0

content.prop: ¬(finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(f x = 0)})) ⟶ sum s f = 0

proof.th: ⊢ (if finite (support plus f ∅) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) (support plus f ∅) (neutral plus) else neutral plus) = 0
⊢ iterate plus ∅ f = 0
⊢ sum ∅ f = 0
⊢ sum ∅ f = 0

content.name: sum_insert
content.prop: finite s ⟶ sum (insert x s) f = (if x ∈ s then sum s f else f x + sum s f)

content.name: sum_union
content.prop: finite s ⟶ finite t ⟶ disjoint s t ⟶ sum (s ∪ t) f = sum s f + sum t f

content.name: sum_diff
content.prop: finite s ⟶ t ⊆ s ⟶ sum (diff s t) f = sum s f - sum t f

content.name: sum_incl_excl
content.prop: finite s ⟶ finite t ⟶ sum s f + sum t f = sum (s ∪ t) f + sum (s ∩ t) f

content.name: sum_support

proof.args: support_support, (if finite (support plus f (support plus f s)) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) (support plus f (support plus f s)) (neutral plus) else neutral plus) = (if finite (support plus f s) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) (support plus f s) (neutral plus) else neutral plus)
proof.th: ⊢ (if finite (support plus f (support plus f s)) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) (support plus f (support plus f s)) (neutral plus) else neutral plus) = (if finite (support plus f s) then itset (λx. λa. f x + a) (support plus f s) (neutral plus) else neutral plus)

proof.args: iterate_def, iterate plus (support plus f s) f = iterate plus s f
proof.th: ⊢ iterate plus (support plus f s) f = iterate plus s f

proof.args: sum_def, sum (support plus f s) f = sum s f
proof.th: ⊢ sum (support plus f s) f = sum s f
⊢ sum (support plus f s) f = sum s f

content.prop: sum (support plus f s) f = sum s f

content.name: sum_add
content.prop: finite s ⟶ sum s (λx. f x + g x) = sum s f + sum s g

content.name: sum_add_gen
prop: ⟶ finite ({x. x ∈ s ∧ ¬(g x = 0)}) ⟶ sum s (λx. f x + g x) = sum s f + sum s g

content.name: sum_eq_0
content.prop: (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = 0) ⟶ sum s f = 0

proof.th: ⊢ sum s (λx. 0) = 0
⊢ sum s (λx. 0) = 0

content.name: sum_lmul
content.prop: sum s (λx. c * f x) = c * sum s f

proof.th: ⊢ ∀x::real. -x = -1 * x
⊢ -(sum s f) = -1 * sum s f

proof.args: sum_lmul, sum s (λx. -1 * f x) = -1 * sum s f
proof.th: ⊢ sum s (λx. -1 * f x) = -1 * sum s f

proof.args: sum s (λx. -(f x)) = -1 * sum s f
proof.th: ⊢ sum s (λx. -(f x)) = -1 * sum s f
⊢ sum s (λx. -(f x)) = -(sum s f)
⊢ sum s (λx. -(f x)) = -(sum s f)

content.name: sum_sub

proof.th: finite s ⊢ finite s

proof.args: sum_add, {f: f, g: λx. -(g x), s: s}
proof.th: finite s ⊢ sum s (λx. f x + -(g x)) = sum s f + sum s (λx. -(g x))
finite s ⊢ sum s (λx. f x + -(g x)) = sum s f + -(sum s g)

proof.args: real_minus_def, sum s (λx. f x - g x) = sum s f - sum s g
proof.th: finite s ⊢ sum s (λx. f x - g x) = sum s f - sum s g
⊢ finite s ⟶ sum s (λx. f x - g x) = sum s f - sum s g

content.prop: finite s ⟶ sum s (λx. f x - g x) = sum s f - sum s g

content.name: sum_le
content.prop: finite s ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x ≤ g x) ⟶ sum s f ≤ sum s g

content.name: sum_lt
content.prop: finite s ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x ≤ g x) ⟶ (∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x) ⟶ sum s f < sum s g

content.name: sum_lt_all

proof.th: finite s ⊢ finite s

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x
finite s, ¬(s = ∅), ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x ≤ g x
⊢ _VAR x
x ∈ s ⊢ x ∈ s
∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x, finite s, ¬(s = ∅), x ∈ s ⊢ f x < g x
finite s, ¬(s = ∅), ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x, x ∈ s ⊢ f x ≤ g x
finite s, ¬(s = ∅), ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x ≤ g x

proof.args: ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x ⊢ ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x
finite s, ¬(s = ∅), ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x ⊢ sum s f < sum s g
⊢ finite s ⟶ ¬(s = ∅) ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x) ⟶ sum s f < sum s g

content.prop: finite s ⟶ ¬(s = ∅) ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x < g x) ⟶ sum s f < sum s g

content.name: sum_pos_lt

proof.th: finite s ⊢ finite s
∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x
∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x
finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x, ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ 0 ≤ sum s (λx. 0)
finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x, ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ sum s (λx. 0) < sum s f
finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x, ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ 0 < sum s f
⊢ finite s ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x) ⟶ (∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x) ⟶ 0 < sum s f

content.prop: finite s ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x) ⟶ (∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x) ⟶ 0 < sum s f

content.name: sum_pos_lt_all

proof.th: finite s ⊢ finite s
∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x
∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 ≤ f x
∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ ∃x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x
finite s, ¬(s = ∅), ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x ⊢ 0 < sum s f
⊢ finite s ⟶ ¬(s = ∅) ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x) ⟶ 0 < sum s f

content.prop: finite s ⟶ ¬(s = ∅) ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < f x) ⟶ 0 < sum s f

content.name: sum_eq

proof.th: finite s ⊢ finite s

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x ≤ g x
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x ≤ g x
finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ sum s f ≤ sum s g

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ g x ≤ f x
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ g x ≤ f x
finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ sum s g ≤ sum s f
finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ sum s f ≤ sum s g ∧ sum s g ≤ sum s f

proof.args: real_le_antisym, sum s f = sum s g
proof.th: finite s, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x ⊢ sum s f = sum s g
⊢ finite s ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x) ⟶ sum s f = sum s g

content.prop: finite s ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ f x = g x) ⟶ sum s f = sum s g

content.name: polynomial_function
content.prop: polynomial_function p ⟷ (∃m. ∃c. ∀x. p x = sum ({0..m}) (λi. c i * x ^ i))
